title: Strengthening Cohesive Writing Skills via English Conjunction Usage

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and ability to construct simple sentences
context.additional_context: Most learners hold managerial/leadership roles and struggle with inconsistent English conjunction usage in official documents. The program incorporates web-based supplementary learning via bring-your-own-device (BYOD) to address this.

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate English conjunctions at the sentence-paragraph level with over 80% accuracy
Learners can compose a coherent English paragraph of five or more sentences using contextually appropriate conjunctions
Learners can identify at least three instances of conjunction misuse in their work documents and reconstruct them into corrected sentences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
